Do what you'd like. No ones (at least not me) but no ones going to be mad if you watch it or not.
I HATED kill la kill when I saw it, but holy shit I freaking love it 
I HATED attack on titan but then I was watching it time the crack of dawn.

You may be surprised, I don't just like monster girls for BOOBS BOOBS BOOBS.
I like monster girls for the character design and they are freaking cute. Kinda like your cute overload with the cat? I forget the name.

But at the end of the day do what you'd like, try the first episode, if you're sold try the manga starting at Chapter 3 if you'd like to see more. [/bq]

topics.body:
Wow; I know you guys don't like politics, but I'm reading the greece bailout shit and I'm reading the stipulations on and it's legitimately getting me angry.

Why is it getting me angry?  Cause all the stipulations are complete and utter political bullshit meant to look good.


What is probably going to happen is that greece is going to be forced into more bad deals and the eu is going to fuck them over hard, but since they're literally giving them money it's going to cancel out.

Essentially:
"See if you completely assimilate into the EU everything goes perfectly!"
"No it didn't!  The only reason why it worked was because you gave them a bailout"
"Questioning the EU?  ONE MILLION YEARS DUNGEON!"
